name: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated
description: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated is a regional bank holding company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. Founded in 1866, Huntington has a rich history of serving the financial needs of its customers with a wide range of banking services. The company operates through its banking subsidiary, Huntington National Bank, offering a comprehensive suite of financial products including personal banking, commercial banking, wealth management, and investment services. Huntington is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and innovative financial solutions tailored to meet the diverse needs of individuals, small businesses, and corporate clients. The bank has embraced digital transformation, enhancing its online and mobile banking platforms to facilitate convenient and secure banking experiences. Huntington is also committed to community involvement and sustainability, actively supporting local initiatives and promoting responsible banking practices. The company’s core values emphasize integrity, respect, and a commitment to the communities it serves. With a strong emphasis on the customer experience, Huntington aims to build lasting relationships and empower its clients to achieve their financial goals.

seo.meta_title: Huntington Bancshares | Regional Bank and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Huntington Bancshares is a regional bank providing a range of financial services including personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management. Discover our commitment to customer service and community.

faq.question: What services does Huntington Bancshares offer?
faq.answer: Huntington Bancshares offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Huntington Bancshares?
faq.answer: Steve Steinour is the CEO of Huntington Bancshares.

faq.question: Where is Huntington Bancshares headquartered?
faq.answer: Huntington Bancshares is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, USA.
